title: 42 - John F. O’Donnell
itunes:title: 42 - John F. O’Donnell
description: If Benjamin Button only aged in reverse in his mind, you would have this week’s guest John F O’Donnell. Year by year, he is bursting with the wonder of a child who has seen more than any of us. He’s a brilliant comedian, podcaster, and humanitarian who has performed around the world and back. We talk about his journey and his battle with… well, listen up to find out! Here are five words to describe this episode: we are all so human.

We talk about his journey and his battle with… well, listen up to find out! Here are five words to describe this episode: we are all so human.
itunes:author: All Things Comedy
